title: I Paid A Private Investigator To Follow Me For A Month
description: In this Max Fosh video, he hires a private investigator to follow him for a month without his knowledge. The investigator captures Max's daily activities and interactions, leading to some humorous and surprising revelations.
summary: Max hires a private investigator to follow him for a month without his knowledge, leading to humorous and surprising findings.
style: Social experiment with a comedic twist
payoff: The payoff comes when Max finally meets the investigator and sees the footage of his activities, realizing how oblivious he was to being followed. The comedic moments and revelations from the footage add to the humor and surprise of the video.
